website_summaries.verdict: Take the guesswork out of sizing with this one-size-fits-most, bold copper cuff, featuring more than 15,000G of magnetic induction at the wrist.
pros: At 7.5 inches long, it fits most wrists
Includes six rare earth magnets with more than 15,000G of magnetism
Some find it alleviates pain in hands and wrist
cons: Very large, so be sure to measure for fit before ordering

customer_reviews.title: Nice style. Works well for me.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, nice looking and seems to help with my arthritis. I've got the broken glass in your feet feeling every morning. The pain is way down after wearing this bracelet for a week. Don't understand the science, but I'm sure my heart and liver are thanking me for not taking a daily Celebrex. I would recommend to anyone, for such an affordable price, it's worth trying. Cheaper and healthier than daily medication.
customer_reviews.author: P. Small

customer_reviews.title: If it has coating then it is not good. Copper needs to be in contact with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed. Most of my copper will tarnish this one does not. So I am questioning if it is real copper. If it has coating then it is not good. Copper needs to be in contact with the skin.
customer_reviews.author: FredM.

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made, good quality. If they only made a larger size I would give them five stars. I have large wrists and the ends dig into me. So it isn't comfortable to wear it very long.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Sharing is caring
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gift. A friend of mine has arthritis . I gave this as a gift She is thrilled
customer_reviews.author: Jan Summers RN, Retired

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! He's been wearing the bracelet every day for ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my adult son who has chronic pain in his knuckles, wrists, shoulders and back. He said he felt pain relief within five minutes of putting it on! Even though that's what was said in other reviews, you still kind of wonder if that could really be. It is! Amazing! He's been wearing the bracelet every day for about a week now, and loves it. It does not take away 100% of pain, but his pain is significantly less.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

customer_reviews.title: Fits well- adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Grandfather. Fit well and he was happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay S.

customer_reviews.title: I never thought it would work
customer_reviews.text: All i can say is that this thing works for me and my mom. The pain in my knuckles are really gone. Some times I may get a very mild pain but it does not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Henrik Voskanian

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my left thumb, and since I received it a couple weeks ago, it has helped relieve the pain by 70 to 75 percent within the first 2 days. After 4 days of wearing it, I took it off before going to bed and the pain was back the next morning, haven’t taken it off since.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, he wore over as month, saw no difference in arthritis and never turned arm another color....perhaps not as advertised. One positive comment, It's Pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Tex Girl

customer_reviews.title: I wear it all the time and feel great. There might not be medical proof
customer_reviews.text: I wear it all the time and feel great. There might not be medical proof, but I'm sure the Doctors don't ever want to prove that it helps because they last a long time and aren't that expensive. Even if it doesn't work it looks nice and doesn't cost a arm and a leg. I think it definitely helps with balance and strength. I'm a believer.
customer_reviews.author: Bigphal

customer_reviews.title: Looks ok
customer_reviews.text: First impression was not very positive. No elegancy, just a piece of metal and you have to bend it - will it brake in half? But I tried it and I let it on my wrist for 30 minute. And I changed my mind to a positive one. It is nicely polished, seems to be solid and looks good. Hoping it will do the job for the therapy as advertised.

It's quite thick, well made and it looks good on him. He was thrilled with it.

customer_reviews.title: 17% - 23% improvement -- "It's easier to manage the pain than to chase it."
customer_reviews.text: 17% - 23% improvement ... "It's easier to manage the pain than to chase it." Sports Injury and carpal-tunnel syndrome pain kept in abeyance. After trying many alternatives to pain management, including wrist splints and wraps, it's nice to have found that the therapeutic technique that I had not yet tried, seems to be working. "Nearly immediate effective pain relief." Placebo effect? Maybe, but I suspect that there really is some therapeutic value and benefit in this simple copper/magnet therapeutic treatment modality. 17% - 23% improvement is a BIG improvement, and I sense that it may get even better over time. "Happiness" = Reality - Expectations ...

product_meta.title: Men's Pure Copper Magnetic Healing Bracelet for Injury Recovery, Arthritis, and Joint Pain Relief - Adjustable Heavyweight Cuff Style - Earth Therapy
product_meta.description: Heavyweight Cuff Bracelet Designed with the Sports-Driven Man in Mind Copper magnetic bands are the perfect solution for any active man seeking to alleviate pain from sport injury, arthritis, carpal tunnel and often concentrated in fingers or hands. People who enjoy active and leisurely lifestyles alike have found copper magnetic therapy to be highly effective solution to to reduce some of their aches and pains associated with arthritis. This classically handsome cuff is the perfect everyday piece that also helps provide pain relief. Why Magnetic and Copper Therapy? Powerful magnets worn close to the joints are known to increase blood flow to these joints, delivering curative vitamins and minerals like iron and vitamin C. For those experiencing inflammatory joint pain, this is the perfect solution. Having a proven record of success, magnets have been used in holistic healing for thousands of years, dating back to ancient Chinese medicine. Due to the above listed reasons, many men are turning to copper and magnetic therapy bracelets as a viable, natural pain management solution for sport injuries and arthritis. The Perfect Gift Our elegant and classic magnetic copper band design comes in a luxurious velvet pouch making it the perfect gift for Father's Day, Religious Holidays, Birthday, Christmas, or any other holiday you need a thoughtful, unique gift for a loved one! Order for you and that special someone today!
feature_bullets: HEAVYWEIGHT CUFF: Designed for mens larger wrist this heavyweight cuff can handle your daily life without sacrificing your style. You'll get all the recovery benefits of copper for issues such as carpal tunnel and wrist tendonitis, while lookng good at the same time.

ONE SIZE FITS MOST WRISTS: Bracelet sizes at an adjustable 6.5 inches in diameter. Each bracelet comes packed in a luxurious velvet pouch making it an easy-to-wrap, beautiful gift for every occasion. Don’t miss out on the gift of the holiday season for

EFFECTIVE AND NONINVASIVE: Benefit from magnetic therapy treatment instead of invasive OTC pills.  Earth Therapy copper magnetic bracelets can help to relieve Arthritis, Joint Pains, RSI, carpal tunnel, migraines, and fatigue. Start taking the steps you need to get back in control of your health.

RARE EARTH MAGNETS: Contains 6 authentic, high-quality, rare earth magnets delivering over 15,000 Gauss to fight pain and inflammation. Unlike other copper bracelets, we source only the finest grade magnetic alloy to eliminate toxins and improve oxygenation in the body.

WE STAND BEHIND OUR BRACELETS: Match your style with magnetic jewelry designed specifically for arthritis pain relief. If you’ve tried copper healing bracelets from Smarter Lifestyle, Rainso, Coppervast, and Viterou – be sure to try our uniquely crafted and designed magnetic healing bracelets for both men and women.
